ygData.subject: Re: EQ slang
ygData.msgSnippet: Mr. Moderator: This list was so nice - who let the infant in - and can you kindly change his diaper and show him the way back to his mother?  He obviously
ygData.messageBody:
Mr. Moderator:

This list was so nice - who let the infant in - and can you kindly change
his diaper and show him the way back to his mother? He obviously needs a
few more lessons in playing well with others, and to learn the meaning of
integrity.


At 07:50 PM 6/28/99 EDT, you wrote:
>From: MrS8N@...
>
>How do smoking and exploiting bugs corelate? Oh wait, I remember. I heard
>this from one of the purple morons. "You're only hurting yourself." Well,
>ask yourself this, Prince: if this is only hurting me, why would you give a
>shit? I am not blaming a tobacco company(what a retarded analogy). I am
>exploiting a bug I *did not* create and harm is in the eye of the beholder.
>If I see no harm in it, and I am not forcing you out of your character into
>my powergaming, so...what the F do you care? I certainly don't see it as
>harmful. I will not die from it. You will not die from it. The problem
>reverts itself straight back to the "I don't like the way you play so I am
>going to complain about you" proselytizing you chartruese dorks do so well.
>Piss off, girly.
>
>--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
>Congratulations to "Make_A_Child_Smile," our latest ONElist of the Week.
>http://www.onelist.com
>How is ONElist changing YOUR life? Visit our homepage and let us know!
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
